title: Loyalty Challenge State
description: Captures the state and progress of loyalty challenges for a customer, including tasks, dependencies, and completion tracking.

xdm:id.title: Challenge ID
xdm:id.description: Unique identifier for the loyalty challenge.

xdm:name.title: Challenge Name
xdm:name.description: Human-readable name of the loyalty challenge.

xdm:startDate.title: Start Date
xdm:startDate.description: Date and time when the challenge started or became available.

xdm:endDate.title: End Date
xdm:endDate.description: Date and time when the challenge expires or ended.

xdm:completionDate.title: Completion Date
xdm:completionDate.description: Date and time when the challenge was completed.

xdm:signupDate.title: Signup Date
xdm:signupDate.description: Date and time when the customer signed up for the challenge.

xdm:optedIn.title: Opted In
xdm:optedIn.description: Indicates whether the customer has opted into the challenge.

xdm:tasksToComplete.title: Tasks to Complete
xdm:tasksToComplete.description: Number of tasks required to complete the challenge.

xdm:challengeId.title: Challenge ID
xdm:challengeId.description: ID of the challenge that this challenge depends on.

xdm:state.title: State
xdm:state.description: Required state of the dependent challenge.

xdm:tasks.title: Tasks
xdm:tasks.description: List of tasks within the challenge.
